// STYLES import { useEffect, useRef, useState } from "react" import "./component-styles/Shopping.css" const Shopping = ({ price }) => { const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(null) const inputRef = useRef() const increment = (e) => { e.preventDefault() if(inputRef.current.value >= 99) return false inputRef.current.value++ } return (

$ {price.toLocaleString()}

setQuantity(e.target.value)} required />
) } export default Shopping
